reviewText: First, if you like silly and cute, and short episodes, you might actually really like this. I couldn't bear to get past more than 5-6 episodes, short as they were.
I watch this anime on Hulu every once in a while and its pretty good. glad it is on DVD.

The preview on the Space Dandy season 1 DVD set made this look like something crazy cool, but it is not. The preview is better than the entire first season. A total con. There is nothing interesting, vaguely funny, or weird about this show. It's just bad. Not for kids and not for adults, but trying to be for both. Don't waste your money on it.
